name: dominion restyle
description: my tweaks for dominion online.  adds a new background image (that is less obtrusive). moves some of the cards more centered. does a bunch of other aesthetic things.  changes fonts (which messes up some layout, but I like it - you'll have to uncomment them if you want them).  reduces the opacity of the card count (unless you hover over them)... maybe some other stuff... try it and see.
